definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Application of Jini Technique to Modern Remote Education System;
sentences.chinese: 研究高等教育结构优化的教育系统工程方法。

sentences.english: Analysis on the higher education on tourism thoroughly, this paper points out a few of measurements to it.
sentences.chinese: 当前山西旅游高等教育难以适应旅游经济的快速发展。

sentences.english: There are both deductions and credits associated with higher education.
sentences.chinese: 与高等教育相关的有扣减和信贷这两种方式。

sentences.english: Fourth, rural families in Huanggang City have very limited capacity to pay for higher education.
sentences.chinese: 第四，黄冈市农村家庭高等教育支付能力十分有限。

sentences.english: One of educational system reforms is implementing flexible educational system, students have benefited from it.
sentences.chinese: 弹性学制给学生带来了益处，是高等教育改革的方向。

sentences.english: The third part mainly inquires into the significance of Neil L. Rudenstine's ideas of higher education.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要探讨了陆登庭高等教育思想的借鉴意义。

sentences.english: The higher education massification attracts attention on higher education quality.
sentences.chinese: 高等教育大众化引起人们对高等教育质量的关注。

sentences.chinese: 高等教育大众化引起人们对高等教育质量的关注。

sentences.english: The higher education of inland can get some enlight…
sentences.chinese: 这些，对于我国内地高等教育有一定的启示。

sentences.english: The higher educational funds assignment pattern has great influence on the students enrollment policy.
sentences.chinese: 高等教育经费分配模式对招生政策具有决定性的影响。

sentences.english: Massification represents a major change in Chinese higher education in the early years of the 21st Century.
sentences.chinese: 大众化是21世纪初期我国高等教育变革的典型表现。

sentences.english: We improved the overall quality of higher education, and enhanced the innovation capacity of colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 全面提高高等教育质量和水平，增强高校创新能力。

sentences.english: All these will make the basis of multiple modes and stratifications of higher education in China.
sentences.chinese: 这将奠定中国多层次和多样化高等教育格局的基础。

sentences.english: A Beijing native, Ulrich earned an Ivy-studded education in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 身为北京人的李晶在美国常春藤名校接受过高等教育。

sentences.english: Innovation is the core and foundation of a sust ai nable development of higher education.
sentences.chinese: 创新是高等教育可持续发展的基础和核心。

sentences.english: The higher education from tests the test to be known as "the first under heaven to test" the fine reputation.
sentences.chinese: 高等教育自考考试素有“天下第一考”之美誉。

definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
